response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. Given its significance and the potential it holds for you, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this item for $1,200,000. This price reflects not only the intrinsic worth of the product but also the confidence I have in its ability to meet your expectations and surpass them. Should you choose to accept this offer, it would be a mutually beneficial arrangement that I believe we both can look forward to. If you need more information or have any concerns, please feel free to reach out. I am here to ensure a smooth transaction and address any queries you might have. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
